DataElement.preferredName: Procedure Domain Biopsy Performed Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to indicate if the biopsy was collected.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to procedure.:The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis._Executed and carried through to completion.

Property.preferredDefinition: Removal and pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue from the living body.:Performed; carried out.

Executed and carried through to completion.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
